title: TNF recap & Week 2 preview
itunes:title: TNF recap & Week 2 preview
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler – recap the Thursday Night Football matchup between the Denver Broncos and the Kansas City Chiefs. Then, Andrew Siciliano joins in as the heroes go game-by-game breaking down each Week 2 matchup.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
